channel.title: CVE Feed for Bitdefender -- Bitdefender Antivirus Free

item.title: CVE-2020-8103|2024-08-04T09:48:25.527Z -- bitdefender -- bitdefender%20antivirus%20free
item.description: A vulnerability in the improper handling of symbolic links in Bitdefender Antivirus Free can allow an unprivileged user to substitute a quarantined file, and restore it to a privileged location. This issue affects Bitdefender Antivirus Free versions prior to 1.0.17.178.
